data.message: Building design intuition through volume requires: 1) Curate quality references (not quantity), 2) Deep analyze for MICRO-PATTERNS (exact percentages, positions, ratios), 3) Store as structured formulas in memory, 4) Apply formulas precisely before improvising. Research sources: Mastercard logo evolution, Gestalt principles, Golden ratio (1.618). Key insight: "Subtraction > Addition" - Mastercard took 50 years to earn wordless status through relentless simplification.
